Description_lang: Gruul slashes at his primary target, inflicting $s1 Physical damage and increasing damage taken by subsequent Inferno Strikes by $s2% per application. This burning slash will also inflict $155080s1 Fire damage split evenly amongst additional enemies in a $155080A1 yard cone in front of the caster, burning them for $155080s2 Fire damage every $155080t2 seconds.
AuraDescription_lang: Damage taken by Inferno Strike increased by $s2%.
